details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.5 Real content without textual semantics - 8.5.1 General - Figure and Formula
details.description: Real content that does not possess the semantics of text objects and does not have an alternate textual representation shall be enclosed within Figure or Formula structure elements as appropriate

rule.description: Real content that does not possess the semantics of text objects and does not have an alternate textual representation shall be enclosed within Figure or Formula structure elements as appropriate
rule.test: itemType == 'text' || isTaggedContent == false || ActualText != null || isArtifact == true || isFigure == true || isFormula == true

error.message: Real content that does not possess the semantics of text objects and does not have an alternate textual representation is not enclosed within Figure or Formula structure elements
